mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysBatchHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ REQUST_ID , BATCH_CLASS_ID , BATCH_PRMTR_CONT , BATCH_BEG_DT , BATCH_END_DT , ELAPSE_TIME , REBEG_YN , BATCH_HIST_STAT_CD , MSG_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_BATCH_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_ID = #{requstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysBatchHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_BATCH_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND REQUST_ID = #{requstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
